name: Jigsaw Puzzle (itch) (Shreejatech)
description:
Play the most addictive puzzle game of 2021. Block puzzle is one of the most popular game with different variant e.g block puzzle, wooden puzzle, gm puzzle..etc.

Jewel Block puzzle is a puzzle game with three engaging mode. 
Classic Mode
Modern Mode
Bomb Mode. 

Bomb mode is one of the best challenging part of Gem game. All you need to do is eliminate the bomb gem from the tile. 

So why you are waiting? Download Jewel Puzzle Game and Eliminate all rows and column by dragging Gems in on tiles.
